testsuite.name: FileServerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
Can't find just saved file in the /server/data folder!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
stdout: Server started! Client started! client accepted Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): into run start to wait info from clie> exit nt The request was sent. Received: PUT test_purpose_5L54QQBI.txt US9HDV8D IOException in PutProcess Sent: All files were sent! start to wait info from client 500 The response says that there is an unexpected error!
